description: Carlos Morales and Christophe Blanc act superior because their relationship is so strong and honest. But things are not what they seem. After making up a fake story, Blanc sneaks off to a raging poolside sex party with Heights and four newcomers: lean Israeli Jony Kfir, hung twink Tommie, adorable Kevin Roberts and studly Brandon Williams.
title: Fire Island Crusing 4: Orgy Scene
